cards.name: Cloud Sprinter
cards.quote: "Across the celestial canvas, I race with the winds, leaving clouds in my wake."

news.title: Air Structure Deck
news.description: Check out our latest video showcasing the Air Structure Deck in action!

cards.name: Breeze Imp
cards.quote: "Born of zephyrs and mischief, I ride the gentle currents."

cards.name: Gust Griffin
cards.quote: "With wings of wind, I soar through the tempest, untamed and fierce."

cards.name: Wind Rider
cards.quote: "In harmony with the breezes, we embrace freedom, swift and untethered."

cards.name: Flying Dwarf
cards.quote: "Defying gravity's grasp, I take to the skies, a dwarf untethered."

cards.name: Stormreaver
cards.quote: "With thunderous might, I command the storm, a force to be reckoned with."

cards.name: Cloud Warden
cards.quote: "Amidst the billowing mists, I stand vigilant, protecting the secrets of the skies."

cards.name: Aqua Dart
cards.quote: "Swift as the flowing stream, I pierce through defenses, leaving no trace behind."

cards.name: Tide Chaser
cards.quote: "With the fury of crashing waves, I strike, a torrential force of nature."

cards.name: Riptide Revenant
cards.quote: "Ravaging through the currents, I am the embodiment of fluidity and speed."

cards.name: Misty Mutt
cards.quote: "Roaming the misty waters, I bring peace to those in need."

cards.name: Lagoon Lurker
cards.quote: "Unleashing the chaotic fury of the whirlpool, I engulf all who dare to challenge me."

cards.name: Vortex Mauler
cards.quote: "In the heart of the tempest, I become the swirling chaos, tearing apart my foes."

cards.name: Wave Guarder
cards.quote: "Ever watchful over the ocean's depths, I protect the serenity within its tumultuous nature."

cards.name: Ember Flicker
cards.quote: "From the flickering embers, I rise, a spark of untamed fire."

cards.name: Inferno Serpent
cards.quote: "With flame-like fangs, I burn, scorching the opposition in my wake."

cards.name: Swiftfire Wyvern
cards.quote: "Like a blazing comet, I streak across the heavens, leaving trails of fire behind."

cards.name: Sizzle Snout
cards.quote: "Forged in the heart of inferno, my snout burns all that stands in my way."

cards.name: Firestorm Brute
cards.quote: "Unleashing the fury of a raging inferno, I consume all in my path."

cards.name: Flame Ravager
cards.quote: "Through scorching flames, I unleash devastation, leaving a trail of destruction behind."

cards.name: Flame Guardian
cards.quote: "A shield of fire, I stand firm, warding off all who dare to approach."

cards.name: Terra Sprinter
cards.quote: "With earth beneath my feet, I sprint through the land, unstoppable and swift."

cards.name: Sandy Scuttler
cards.quote: "Within the shifting sands, I navigate effortlessly, striking with precision."

cards.name: Swiftreaver
cards.quote: "Like the rolling sands, I burrow beneath my foes, leaving no time to react."

cards.name: Earth Dweller
cards.quote: "A master of earth, I engage in a dance of strength and agility, toppling my adversaries."

cards.name: Geo Monkey
cards.quote: "With unstoppable force, I shatter the mountains, reducing them to rubble."

cards.name: Mountain Crusher
cards.quote: "Unyielding and immovable, I am the epitome of strength."

cards.name: Stone Behemoth
cards.quote: "An unbreakable fortress, I withstand all assaults, offering steadfast protection."

cards.name: Wind Sprite
cards.ability: This creature does not use an action while attacking. This creature can only attack once per turn.

cards.name: Aerofeet
cards.ability: Once per turn, you can switch the position of 1 creature on the field.

cards.name: Skyborne Slicer
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, you may choose 1 creature on the field (that costs 0 essence to summon) and return it to the owner’s hand.

cards.name: Aero Elf
cards.ability: When this card is destroyed by battle, you can bring one Air creature from your graveyard into your hand (excluding “Aero Elf”).

cards.name: Storm Ghost
cards.ability: While attacking, gain 30 Strength.

cards.name: Wind Troll
cards.ability: While attacking, this creature may target your opponent directly (ignoring opposing shields).

cards.name: Cyclone Sentinel
cards.ability: Once per turn, when this creature is targeted by an attack or effect, you may change the target to another Air creature you control.

cards.name: River Sprite
cards.ability: When this card inflicts battle damage to a creature, generate 1 Water Essence.

cards.name: Aqua Shade
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, this creature is cannot be attacked or targeted by abilities until the beginning of your next turn.

cards.name: Sea Serpent
cards.ability: When this card destroys another creature by battle, steal 1 essence from your opponent.

cards.name: Naiad Elf
cards.ability: When this card is destroyed by battle, summon 1 Water creature that costs 0 essence from your deck (excluding“Naiad Elf”).

cards.name: Deepseer
cards.ability: Once per turn, you may look at the bottom 2 cards of your deck. Send 1 card to the graveyard and put the other card on top of your deck.

cards.name: Oceanus
cards.ability: This creature gains 45 Strength when attacking blocking creatures.

cards.name: Aquarion
cards.ability: When another creature blocks for this card, the blocking creature gains 20 Strength until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Cinder Sprite
cards.ability: When this card inflicts battle damage to a creature, generate 1 Fire Essence.

cards.name: Embermander
cards.ability: Once per turn, you may switch the position of 1 creature on the field.

cards.name: Solar Phoenix
cards.ability: When this card is destroyed by battle, summon 1 Fire creature that costs 0 essence from your deck (excluding “Solar Phoenix”).

cards.name: Ardor Elf
cards.ability: When this card destroys another creature by battle, it deals direct damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed creature's strength.

cards.name: Emberwing
cards.ability: Once per turn, deal 25 damage to any creature on the field.

cards.name: Inferno Beast
cards.ability: When this card is destroyed by battle, your opponent consumes 2 Essence of any element(s).

cards.name: Flamekeeper
cards.ability: When this card attacks a blocking creature, gain 25 Agility until end of the turn.

cards.name: Ivy Gila
cards.ability: This creature's attacks cannot be blocked.

cards.name: Nimblefoot
cards.ability: When this card blocks for another creature, gain 1 Earth Essence.

cards.name: Terragon
cards.ability: Once per turn, switch the position of an opponent's creature.

cards.name: Verdant Elf
cards.ability: When blocking for another creature, gain 25 Strength.

cards.name: Boulder Brute
cards.ability: This creature deals an extra 55 damage when attacking shields.

cards.name: Mountain Giant
cards.ability: Once per turn, you may gain 65 Strength until the end of the turn, but this card does not regain its action next turn.

cards.name: Terra Warden
cards.ability: When this creature is destroyed, gain 1 Earth essence for every Earth creature on the field.

cards.name: Cyclonos
cards.quote: "Unleashed from the heart of the tempest, I take flight."

cards.name: Avis
cards.quote: "With wings of freedom, I soar through the skies, swift and untethered, leaving a trail of wonder in my wake."

cards.name: Vayute
cards.quote: "I bring both tranquility and force, a gentle caress or a mighty tempest, guided by the winds."

cards.name: Zephos
cards.quote: "The azure skies, a symbol of serenity and calm, yet harboring the potential for turbulent power."

cards.name: Hydran
cards.quote: "From the depths of the waters, I emerge, a creature of fluid grace, harnessing the currents to wield both tranquility and fury."

cards.name: Typhos
cards.quote: "With stormy might, I command the tempest, a force of nature that can bring both destruction and renewal."

cards.name: Vapora
cards.quote: "Misty tendrils wrap around me, giving shape to the ephemeral, as I become an ethereal embodiment of air and water."

cards.name: Glacis
cards.quote: "Through icy breath and frozen touch, I create a realm of frost and chill, a majestic presence that commands respect."

cards.name: Sunny
cards.quote: "Within the swirling vortex, I am the eye of the storm, an enigma of power and calm, ready to unleash my turbulent might."

cards.name: Kindro
cards.quote: “I carry the whispering embers, bringing harmony and balance to Kinbrold.”

cards.name: Nova
cards.quote: "With radiant brilliance, I illuminate the skies, a celestial phenomenon that captivates and inspires awe."

cards.name: Vorax
cards.quote: "A staut protector, fiery and unyielding, embodying the strength of the land."

cards.name: Oris
cards.quote: "In the golden light of dawn, I awaken, a harbinger of new beginnings, bringing warmth and vitality to all that surround me."

cards.name: Quarris
cards.quote: "Through the shifting sands, I navigate with grace and precision, a desert dweller with the power to shape the land."

cards.name: Roc
cards.quote: "With wings spanning the horizon, I am the embodiment of power and majesty, soaring through the heavens with unwavering strength."

cards.name: Geodar
cards.quote: "Rooted deep within the earth, I am a guardian of stone and stability, unyielding and resolute in the face of adversity."

cards.name: Nimbus | The Air Titan
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, choose 1 creature, rune, or counter card on the opponent's side of the field and destroy it.
cards.specialAbility: Destroy 1 card on the opponent's side of the field.

cards.name: Lazu | The Air Tempest
cards.ability: While this card is in play, gain 1 Air essence for every rune card used.
cards.specialAbility: You may convert up to 5 essence from one  element to another.

cards.name: Aeris | The Air Slyph
cards.ability: Once per turn, you may switch the position of one creature your opponent controls.
cards.specialAbility: Send 1 creature from the field to the owner's hand. The owner generates essence according to the essence required to summon the creature.

cards.name: Torrent | The Water Titan
cards.ability: Once per turn while attacking, this creature gains Double Strike (Double Strike allows a creature to attack the same target twice in one battle).
cards.specialAbility: When attacking a shield, deal an additional 50 damage.

cards.name: Azura | The Water Tempest
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, draw 2 cards.
cards.specialAbility: You may normal summon 1 additional creature this turn.

cards.name: Undine | The Water Oracle
cards.ability: While this card is on the field, at the beginning of your turn, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may discard 1, then place the remaining on top of your deck in any order.
cards.specialAbility: Immediately after using Deep Insight, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Ignus | The Fire Titan
cards.ability: When this card declares an attack on another creature, this card gains 55 Strength until the end of the turn.
cards.specialAbility: Your opponent chooses 2 cards to discard from their hand.

cards.name: Sigmus | The Fire Tempest
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, deal 25 damage to all creatures and shields your opponent controls.
cards.specialAbility: Deal 25 damage to each creature and shield on the field.

cards.name: Viktor | The Fire Demon
cards.ability: Once per turn, you can destroy one of your own creatures to increase this card's Strength and Agility each by 50 until the end of the turn.
cards.specialAbility: Immediately after using Flame Ascendance, return the destroyed creature to the field.

cards.name: Terra | The Earth Titan
cards.ability: Once per turn, you may switch the position of 1 creature on the field.
cards.specialAbility: When blocking for another creature, gain 50 Strength until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Oryssa | The Earth Tempest
cards.ability: While this card is on the field, your shields gain 50 Health. When this card is destroyed, attach it to a shield. The attached shield gains 50 Health.
cards.specialAbility: Choose 1 creature on the field to gain 50 Strength until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Leo | The Earth Sovereign
cards.ability: While this card is on the field, gain 1 Earth Essence for every Earth creature that is destroyed. When this creature is destroyed, special summon one Earth creature from the graveyard (cannot be this card).
cards.specialAbility: Change the target of an opposing creature's attack.

cards.name: Essence Exchange
cards.ability: Exchange any amount of one elemental essence for an equal amount of a different elemental essence.

cards.name: Cleanse & Adapt
cards.ability: Select 1 creature, then remove any equipment cards, reset the creature's battle points, and restore all actions.

cards.name: Quick Spurt
cards.ability: Choose 1 effect: All your creatures gain 15 Agility until the end of the turn. Or Choose 1 creature to gain 50 Agility until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Flaming Resolve
cards.ability: Generate 3 Fire Essence.

cards.name: Wave's Endurance
cards.ability: Generate 3 Water Essence.

cards.name: Unbreakable Force
cards.ability: Generate 3 Earth Essence.

cards.name: Gale's Veil
cards.ability: Generate 3 Air Essence.

cards.name: Scrying Glass
cards.ability: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, rearrange them in any order and you may discard 1 card.

cards.name: Heavy Chains
cards.ability: Equip this card to a creature. The equipped creature loses 30 Strength and 30 Agility.

cards.name: Stasis Field
cards.ability: Change the position of any creature on the field.

cards.name: Elemental Barrage
cards.ability: Choose 1 Element. All creatures of that element gain 25 Strength until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Essence Leak
cards.ability: Deplete any amount of one elemental essence. Your opponent depletes the same amount of the essence of their choice.

cards.name: Elemental Surge
cards.ability: Draw 1 card. If the drawn card is not a creature card you may reveal it to draw 1 more card.

cards.name: Essence Amplifier
cards.ability: Equip this card to a creature. The equipped creature generates double their normal essence each turn.

cards.name: Binding Coils
cards.ability: Equip this card to a creature. The equipped creature becomes and remains Exhausted.

cards.name: Intrusion Seal
cards.ability: Choose 1 effect: Destroy a Rune or Counter card that your opponent controls. or Negate a Rune or Counter card that your opponent activates.

cards.name: Direct Assault
cards.ability: Deal 50 damage to a selected target (Creature or Shield).

cards.name: Draconic Adaptability
cards.ability: Until the end of the turn, Dragon creatures can be summoned using any combination of their required essence.

cards.name: Lifebound Armour
cards.ability: Equip this card to a creature. If the equipped creature would be destroyed, destroy this card instead and restore the creature to full strength.

cards.name: Ethereal Vitality
cards.ability: Choose 1 effect: Grant 100 Health to a selected Shield until the end of the turn. or Choose 1 creature to gain 30 Strength and 15 Agility until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Counter Pulse
cards.ability: Destroy the summoned creature.
cards.trigger: When your opponent summons a creature without spending essence:

cards.name: Essence Leech
cards.ability: Your opponent depletes all of the essence generated.
cards.trigger: When your opponent generates essence:

cards.name: Denial Decimation
cards.ability: Negate the enhanced effect. You may pay matching essence cost (using any 1 element) to destroy destroy that card.
cards.trigger: When your opponent uses an enhanced effect:

cards.name: Redirecting Gust
cards.ability: Redirect the attack to another one of their creatures (Unblockable).
cards.trigger: When your opponent declares an attack:

cards.name: Armour Degradation
cards.ability: The blocking creature's Strength is reduced by 50 until the end of the turn.
cards.trigger: When your opponent declares a blocking creature:

cards.name: Reflective Barrier
cards.ability: Reflect the damage from the target of the attack to the attacking creature (Blockable).
cards.trigger: When your opponent declares an attack:

cards.name: Whirlwind Retreat
cards.ability: Negate the attack and return the attacker to your opponent's hand. Your opponent generates 3 essence of the creature's element. This card cannot be used on Dragons.
cards.trigger: When your opponent declares an attack:

cards.name: Chaos Hand
cards.ability: They discard 2 cards.
cards.trigger: When your opponent draws a card:

cards.name: Agility's Valor
cards.ability: Boost 1 creature's agility on the field by 50 until the end of the turn.
cards.trigger: When your opponent declares an attack:

cards.name: Time Freeze
cards.ability: Prevent the opponent from summoning creatures and placing counter and rune cards until the end of the turn.
cards.trigger: When your opponent generates essence:

cards.name: Quietening Wind
cards.ability: Prevent activation of creature and rune effects until the end of the turn.
cards.trigger: When your opponent draws a card:

cards.name: Vortex Shift
cards.ability: Change the position of any creature on the field (Grant or Remove an action).
cards.trigger: When your opponent declares an attack:

cards.name: Power Surge
cards.ability: Choose 1 creature on your side of the field to gain 20 Strength and 30 Agility until the end of the turn.
cards.trigger: When your opponent declares a blocking creature:

cards.name: Essence Bloom
cards.ability: Generate an equal amount of essence using elements of your choice.
cards.trigger: When your opponent generates essence:

cards.name: Elemental Reaction
cards.ability: Destroy 1 of their creatures that generated essence this turn.
cards.trigger: When your opponent generates essence:

cards.name: Unbreakable
cards.ability: Prevent all damage to your shields for one turn.
cards.trigger: When your opponent declares an attack:

cards.name: Rapid Recovery
cards.ability: Prevent it's destruction and restore its Strength and actions fully.
cards.trigger: When a creature you control would be destroyed by battle:

cards.name: Revival Rain
cards.ability: Summon a creature of the same element (excluding the destroyed creature) from your graveyard. This creature enters Exhausted.
cards.trigger: When a creature you control is destroyed:

cards.name: Echo of Destruction
cards.ability: Destroy all creatures sharing its element. Each player generates essence equal to their destroyed creatures' generation
cards.trigger: When your opponent summons a creature:

cards.name: Oblivion Rift
cards.ability: Destroy all cards on the field. Each player discards and draws 3 cards.
cards.trigger: When your opponent draws a card:

cards.name: Guardian's Sanctuary
cards.ability: Draw 2 cards.
cards.specialAbility: Choose 1 Element for your opponent to consume up to 4 essence of.

cards.name: Mystic Ward
cards.ability: Destroy up to 2 Rune/Counter cards on the field.
cards.specialAbility: Equip this card to a creature (this card now acts as an Equipment card). The equipped creature loses 40 Strength or 20 Agility (choose 1) while this card remains equipped.

cards.name: Oracle's Guard
cards.ability: Choose 1 Rune/Counter card from your deck, then bring it to your hand. Destroy 1 Rune/Counter card on the field.
cards.specialAbility: Choose 1 Element and bring a creature of that element to your hand (excluding Dragons). You may destroy 1 creature on the field of the same element that costs 0 essence to summon.

cards.name: Scholar's Protection
cards.ability: Draw 3 cards from the deck, discard 1 and put the remaining 2 in your hand.
cards.specialAbility: Draw 1 card. Your opponent selects 1 card from their hand and sends it to their graveyard. Return 1 card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Woodland Wall
cards.ability: Draw 1 card. Gain 3 Earth Essence.
cards.specialAbility: Equip this card to a creature (this card now acts as an Equipment card). The equipped creature gains 40 Strength while this card remains equipped.

cards.name: Aqua Ward
cards.ability: Draw 1 card. Gain 3 Water Essence.
cards.specialAbility: Choose to discard any number of cards from your hand, then draw an equal number of cards.

cards.name: Ember Bulwark
cards.ability: Draw 1 card. Gain 3 Fire Essence.
cards.specialAbility: Deal 120 damage to a target creature or deal 150 damage to a shield.

cards.name: Gust Screen
cards.ability: Draw 1 card. Gain 3 Air Essence.
cards.specialAbility: Equip this card to a creature (this card now acts as an Equipment card). The equipped creature gains 20 Agility while this card remains equipped.

cards.name: Frost Veil
cards.ability: Freeze a target creature (that creature can't attack or block) until the end of your next turn.
cards.specialAbility: Gain 2 Air and 2 Water Essence.

cards.name: Spark Wall
cards.ability: At the beginning of your next turn, deal 40 damage to each creature your opponent controls or choose 1 creature to deal 120 damage to.
cards.specialAbility: Gain 2 Air and 2 Fire Essence.

cards.name: Lava Guard
cards.ability: During your next turn, any damage you deal to shields is doubled.
cards.specialAbility: Gain 2 Earth and 2 Fire Essence.

cards.name: Toxic Guard
cards.ability: Equip this card to the creature that destroyed it (this card now acts as a rune equipment card). The equipped creature cannot regain its action while this card is attached.
cards.specialAbility: Gain 2 Fire and 2 Water Essence.

cards.name: Sand Fortress
cards.ability: During your next turn, any creature with 60 or more agility can target your opponent directly.
cards.specialAbility: Gain 2 Air and 2 Earth Essence.

cards.name: Crystal Shield
cards.ability: Attach this to a remaining shield. The attached shields gains an additional 150 health.
cards.specialAbility: Gain 2 Earth and 2 Water Essence.

cards.name: Radiant Buckler
cards.ability: Equip this card to a creature (this card now acts as an Equipment card). The equipped creature regains its action at the end of every turn.
cards.specialAbility: Place this card face-up in your Rune/Counter card area. No Counter cards may be placed while this remains face-up (this card is now treated as a Rune card).

cards.name: Mythical Barrier
cards.ability: Draw 3 cards.
cards.specialAbility: Draw 2 cards & you can now hold a maximum of 8 cards.

cards.name: Shadow Guard
cards.ability: Destroy 1 creature your opponent controls.
cards.specialAbility: Destroy up to 2 Rune/Counter cards on the field.

cards.name: Harmonic Shield
cards.ability: Discard 1 creature from your hand and destroy all creatures on the field with the element of the discarded creature.
cards.specialAbility: Discard 1 creature from your hand. Draw a card one at a time until you draw another creature of the same element.

cards.name: Draconic Shield
cards.ability: Select 2 elements. Generate 3 essence of each selected element.
cards.specialAbility: Special Summon 1 "Dragon" from your hand or graveyard.

cards.name: Spectral Shield
cards.ability: Select 2 cards in your graveyard and return them to your hand.
cards.specialAbility: Summon 1 creature from your graveyard.

cards.name: Phantom Veil
cards.ability: Draw 2 cards. For each creature card drawn, generate 3 essence corresponding to the creature's element.
cards.specialAbility: Discard a creature from your hand, then draw 1 card. If the drawn card and discarded creature are of the same element (excluding Dragons), then Special Summon the discarded creature.

cards.name: Whirlwind Barrier
cards.ability: Gain 8 Air Essence.
cards.specialAbility: During your next turn, all Air creatures you control gain Double Strike.

cards.name: Torrent Barrier
cards.ability: Gain 8 Water Essence.
cards.specialAbility: Draw 2 cards. Your opponent selects 2 cards from their hand and sends them to their graveyard.

cards.name: Flame Barrier
cards.ability: Gain 8 Fire Essence.
cards.specialAbility: During your next turn, all Fire creatures gain Pierce.

cards.name: Geode Barrier
cards.ability: Gain 8 Earth Essence.
cards.specialAbility: At the end of your next turn, all Earth creatures you control gain their action back if it was used.

cards.name: Phoenix Shield
cards.ability: Summon 1 creature from your graveyard & destroy all creatures on the field with a lower strength.
cards.specialAbility: Summon 1 creature from your graveyard & destroy all creatures on the field with a higher agility.

cards.name: Titan's Shield
cards.ability: Special Summon a "Titan" card from your deck. Equip this shield to that Titan (this card now acts as an Equipment card). Your opponent's attacks must be declared on this Titan while this shield remains attached.
cards.specialAbility: Summon 1 creature from your hand. All of your attacking creatures next turn gain Double Strike.

cards.name: Celestial Fortress
cards.ability: Gain 15 elemental essence of any combination of elements.
cards.specialAbility: Summon any 2 creatures from your hand, field free of cost.

cards.name: Tempest Barrier
cards.ability: Destroy all rune and counter cards on the field (including equipments).
cards.specialAbility: Prevent your opponent from attacking or blocking for the next 2 turns.

cards.name: Elemental Shield
cards.ability: Draw 3 cards. Deplete your opponent's essence pool by up to 12 of any essence combination.
cards.specialAbility: Summon 1 card from your graveyard (excluding Dragons). Gain 12 essence of the summoned creature's element.

cards.name: Ancient Winds
cards.ability: While this card is on the field, draw 1 card for every Air creature summoned.

cards.name: Ancient Tide
cards.ability: At the end of each of your turns, discard up to 2 cards from your hand, then draw one card for each discarded card.

cards.name: Ancient Roots
cards.ability: At the end of each of your  turns, draw 1 card for every Earth creature you control.

cards.name: Ancient Ember
cards.ability: While this card is on the field, draw 1 card for every creature destroyed by a Fire creature (in battle or by effect).

cards.name: Ancient Sigil
cards.ability: If you possess Ancient Winds, Ancient Tide, Ancient Roots, and Ancient Ember in your hand or on your field, instantly claim an ultimate victory. Automatically win the game, you’ve mastered every element!

cards.name: Eldritch | The Frost Dragon
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, Freeze all creatures your opponent controls (A frozen creature loses all actions).
cards.specialAbility: Deal 50 damage to all frozen creatures or creatures that do not have any actions remaining.

cards.name: Veton | The Lightning Dragon
cards.ability: When this card declares an attack on a creature, it targets all opposing creatures of the same element as the attacked or blocking creature simultaneously.
cards.specialAbility: Discard any number of cards from your hand. For every card discarded, your opponent must discard an equal number of cards from their hand.

cards.name: Diamoria | The Crystal Dragon
cards.ability: When attacking a shield, gain Double Strike. While this card is on the field, use both effects of any broken shields you control.
cards.specialAbility: Gain Double Strike when battling against another creature.

cards.name: Zoryn | The Lava Dragon
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, deal 30 damage to all creatures on the field.
cards.specialAbility: Deal 60 damage to all enemy creatures on the field.

cards.name: Noxilus | The Poison Dragon
cards.ability: When this creature destroys an opponent's creature by battle, the opponent must deplete 2 essence of the destroyed creature’s element.
cards.specialAbility: In addition to the "Toxic Splash" effect, your opponent must discard 2 cards from their hand.

cards.name: Aridus | The Sand Dragon
cards.ability: While this card is on the field, negate all Rune/Counter cards. When your opponent attacks, you may discard 1 placed Rune/Counter card to redirect the attack.
cards.specialAbility: Draw 2 cards. You may discard any number of Rune/Counter cards. Destroy a creature on the field for each discarded Rune/Counter card.

cards.name: Galea | The Air Elementalist
cards.ability: When this card is normal summoned, send 2 cards from your opponent's side of the field to the graveyard.
cards.specialAbility: Redistribute this card's total Strength and Agility (450 total) until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Mek | The Water Elementalist
cards.ability: While this card is on the field, generate 2 Water Essence for every Water creature summoned.
cards.specialAbility:
Draw one card for every Water creature
on the field.

cards.name: Osao | The Fire Elementalist
cards.ability: While this creature is on the field, all Fire creatures gain Pierce.
cards.specialAbility: Deal 10 damage to each creature your opponent controls for every essence spent.

cards.name: Balon | The Earth Elementalist
cards.ability:
When this card is normal summoned, you may add 1 Earth Creature from your deck to your hand.
Once per turn, you may discard 1 Earth Creature to destroy 1 card on the field.
cards.specialAbility: Every creature your opponent control loses all actions.
